name: Mansion of Sorrows
description:
A short 2D sidescroller with platforming , combat, and some Metroidvania inspirations.
Try to find the hidden frog :)

Credits:

Alexander Saleteg - Game Design, Level Design, Animations

Moa Bruus - Concept art, 2D art, enemy mesh, rig and textures, Sound Design

Natasha Mangan - Programming, UI

External Assets:

The character model and rig used is the AZRI rig available for free from GameAnim.

The sound assets are taken from FreeSound.org with credits bellow:

  • Amatvejuk721:   Death Breath
  • ludist:   soul-death.mp3
  • Maemi_no_yume:   dash sound
  • xtrgamr:   Hit, OWWWWWWWW!.wav
  • boodabomb:   breath of death.mp3

Music: Warsong Counsils by TeknoAxe
